attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: poo makes toilets smell, surely we should have poo free toilets?! and there should be no smelly urine either. people who have eaten asparagus or similar to make their wee potentially smell should attend the pooing booths which should be smell proof and should be fully equipped with the best quality fans and air fresheners

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
